snippet.title: Advance Wars 1 + 2 Re-Boot Camp Trailer | Nintendo E3 2021
snippet.description: Advance War returns for the Nintendo Switch! Advance Wars has been reimagined and built from the ground up, with all new 3D graphics and animations. This grid-based strategy game was a classic for the Nintendo hand helds. Advance Wars 1 + 2 Re-Boot Camp releases December 3, 2021.
